description.en: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ar: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.br: Esta capa está carregada com belas pétalas de flores; foi nomeada por TWISTED e chicababby em Aibatt!
description.cns: 披风描绘了美丽的花瓣；它是以独眼蝠的扭捏命名的！装备后提供速度+15%和HP+100。
description.fi: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fil: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fr: Cette cape est chargée de puissants pétales de fleurs ; elle a été nommée par TWISTED et chicababby sur Aibatt! Elle confère à son porteur un bonus de 15% de vitesse et 100 PV.
description.id: Jubah ini sarat dengan kelopak bunga yang indah; Dinamai oleh TWISTED dan chicababby di Aibatt! Ini memberi pemakainya 15% Speed dan 100 HP Boost.
description.it: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.jp: このマントには美しい花びらがたくさんあります。それはアイバットのツイステッドとチカベビーによって名付けられました！
description.kr: 이 망토에는 아름다운 꽃잎이 가득합니다. 그것은 Aibatt의 TWISTED와 chicababby에 의해 명명되었습니다! 착용자에게 15 % 속도와 100 HP 부스트를 제공합니다.
description.nl: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.pl: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ru: Дизайн этого плаща был разработан простыми мадригальцами по имени TWISTED и chicababby. Дает +15% к скорости и +100 к ОЗ.
description.sp: Esta capa está cargada de hermosos pétalos de flores; ¡Fue nombrado por TWISTED y chicababby en Aibatt! Le da al usuario un 15% de velocidad de movimiento y un aumento de 100 HP.
description.sw: This cloak is loaded with beautiful flower petals; it was named by TWISTED and chicababby on Aibatt! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้เต็มไปด้วยกลีบดอกไม้ที่สวยงาม มันถูกตั้งชื่อโดย Twisted และ chicababby บน Aibatt! ทำให้ผู้สวมใส่มีความเร็ว 15% และบูสต์ 100 HP
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng này được kết bằng những cánh hoa xinh đẹp; nó được đặt tên bởi TWISTED và chicababby trên Aibatt! Nó cung cấp cho người mặc 15% Tốc độ và tăng 100 HP.
